verses.verse: Then Moses <S%H4872><s%> answered <S%H6030><s%> and said, <S%H559><s%> "What if <S%H2005><s%> they will not believe <S%H539><s%> me, or listen <S%H8085><s%> to what <S%H6963><s%> I say <S%H6963><s%>? For they may say, <S%H559><s%> 'The Lord <S%H3068><s%> has not appeared <S%H7200><s%> to you.'"
And the Lord <S%H3068><s%> said <S%H559><s%> to him, "What <S%H4100><s%> is that in your hand <S%H3027><s%>?" And he said, <S%H559><s%> "A staff. <S%H4294><s%>"

Then He said, <S%H559><s%> "Throw <S%H7993><s%> it on the ground. <S%H776><s%>" So he threw <S%H7993><s%> it on the ground, <S%H776><s%> and it became <S%H1961><s%> a serpent; <S%H5175><s%> and Moses <S%H4872><s%> fled <S%H5127><s%> from it.

But the Lord <S%H3068><s%> said <S%H559><s%> to Moses, <S%H4872><s%> "Stretch <S%H7971><s%> out your hand <S%H3027><s%> and grasp <S%H270><s%> [it] by its tail <S%H2180><s%>" – so he stretched <S%H7971><s%> out his hand <S%H3027><s%> and caught <S%H2388><s%> it, and it became <S%H1961><s%> a staff <S%H4294><s%> in his hand <S%H3709><s%> –

"that they may believe <S%H539><s%> that the Lord, <S%H3068><s%> the God <S%H430><s%> of their fathers, the God <S%H1><s%> of Abraham, <S%H430><s%> the God <S%H85><s%> of Isaac, <S%H430><s%> and the God <S%H3327><s%> of Jacob, <S%H430><s%> has appeared <S%H3290><s%> to you."

And the Lord <S%H3068><s%> furthermore <S%H5750><s%> said <S%H559><s%> to him, "Now <S%H4994><s%> put <S%H935><s%> your hand <S%H3027><s%> into your bosom. <S%H2436><s%>" So he put <S%H935><s%> his hand <S%H3027><s%> into his bosom, <S%H2436><s%> and when he took <S%H3318><s%> it out, behold, <S%H2009><s%> his hand <S%H3027><s%> was leprous <S%H6879><s%> like snow. <S%H7950><s%>

Then He said, <S%H559><s%> "Put <S%H7725><s%> your hand <S%H3027><s%> into your bosom <S%H2436><s%> again. <S%H7725><s%>" So he put <S%H7725><s%> his hand <S%H3027><s%> into his bosom <S%H2436><s%> again; <S%H7725><s%> and when he took <S%H3318><s%> it out of his bosom, <S%H2436><s%> behold, <S%H2009><s%> it was restored <S%H7725><s%> like [the rest of] his flesh. <S%H1320><s%>

"And it shall come <S%H1961><s%> about that if <S%H518><s%> they will not believe <S%H539><s%> you or heed <S%H8085><s%> the witness <S%H6963><s%> of the first <S%H7223><s%> sign, <S%H226><s%> they may believe <S%H539><s%> the witness <S%H6963><s%> of the last <S%H314><s%> sign. <S%H226><s%>

"But it shall be that if <S%H518><s%> they will not believe <S%H539><s%> even <S%H1571><s%> these <S%H428><s%> two <S%H8147><s%> signs <S%H226><s%> or heed <S%H8085><s%> what <S%H6963><s%> you say, <S%H6963><s%> then you shall take <S%H3947><s%> some <S%H4480><s%> water <S%H4325><s%> from the Nile <S%H2975><s%> and pour <S%H8210><s%> it on the dry <S%H3004><s%> ground; <S%H3004><s%> and the water <S%H4325><s%> which <S%H834><s%> you take <S%H3947><s%> from the Nile <S%H2975><s%> will become <S%H1961><s%> blood <S%H1818><s%> on the dry <S%H3006><s%> ground. <S%H3006><s%>"

Then Moses <S%H4872><s%> said <S%H559><s%> to the Lord, <S%H3068><s%> "Please, <S%H994><s%> Lord, <S%H136><s%> I have never <S%H3808><s%> been eloquent, <S%H376><s%> <S%H1697><s%> neither <S%H1571><s%> recently <S%H4480><s%> <S%H8543><s%> nor <S%H1571><s%> in time <S%H8032><s%> past, <S%H8032><s%> nor <S%H1571><s%> since <S%H9241><s%> Thou hast spoken <S%H1696><s%> to Thy servant; <S%H5650><s%> for I am slow <S%H3515><s%> of speech <S%H6310><s%> and slow <S%H3515><s%> of tongue. <S%H3956><s%>"

And the Lord <S%H3068><s%> said <S%H559><s%> to him, "Who <S%H4310><s%> has made <S%H7760><s%> man's mouth <S%H6310><s%>? Or <S%H176><s%> who <S%H4310><s%> makes <S%H7760><s%> [him] dumb <S%H483><s%> or <S%H176><s%> deaf, <S%H2795><s%> or <S%H176><s%> seeing <S%H6493><s%> or <S%H176><s%> blind <S%H5787><s%>? Is it not I, the Lord <S%H3068><s%>?
"Now <S%H6258><s%> then go, <S%H1980><s%> and I, even I, will be with your mouth, <S%H6310><s%> and teach <S%H3384><s%> you what <S%H834><s%> you are to say. <S%H1696><s%>"
But he said, <S%H559><s%> "Please, <S%H994><s%> Lord, <S%H136><s%> now <S%H4994><s%> send <S%H7971><s%> [the message] by whomever Thou wilt. <S%H7971><s%>"

Then the anger <S%H639><s%> of the Lord <S%H3068><s%> burned <S%H2734><s%> against Moses, <S%H4872><s%> and He said, <S%H559><s%> "Is there not your brother <S%H251><s%> Aaron <S%H175><s%> the Levite <S%H3881><s%>? I know <S%H3045><s%> that he speaks <S%H1696><s%> fluently. <S%H1696><s%> And moreover, <S%H1571><s%> behold, <S%H2009><s%> he is coming <S%H3318><s%> out to meet <S%H7122><s%> you; when he sees <S%H7200><s%> you, he will be glad <S%H8055><s%> in his heart. <S%H3820><s%>

"And you are to speak <S%H1696><s%> to him and put <S%H7760><s%> the words <S%H1697><s%> in his mouth; <S%H6310><s%> and I, even I, will be with your mouth <S%H6310><s%> and his mouth, <S%H6310><s%> and I will teach <S%H3384><s%> you what <S%H834><s%> you are to do. <S%H6213><s%>

"Moreover, he shall speak <S%H1696><s%> for you to the people; <S%H5971><s%> and it shall come <S%H1961><s%> about that he shall be as a mouth <S%H6310><s%> for you, and you shall be as God <S%H430><s%> to him.
"And you shall take <S%H3947><s%> in your hand <S%H3027><s%> this <S%H2088><s%> staff, <S%H4294><s%> with which <S%H834><s%> you shall perform <S%H6213><s%> the signs. <S%H226><s%>"

Then Moses <S%H4872><s%> departed <S%H1980><s%> and returned <S%H7725><s%> to Jethro <S%H3500><s%> his father-in-law, and said <S%H559><s%> to him, "Please, <S%H4994><s%> let me go, <S%H1980><s%> that I may return <S%H7725><s%> to my brethren <S%H251><s%> who <S%H834><s%> are in Egypt, <S%H4714><s%> and see <S%H7200><s%> if they are still <S%H5750><s%> alive. <S%H2416><s%>" And Jethro <S%H3503><s%> said <S%H559><s%> to Moses, <S%H4872><s%> "Go <S%H1980><s%> in peace. <S%H7965><s%>"

Now the Lord <S%H3068><s%> said <S%H559><s%> to Moses <S%H4872><s%> in Midian, <S%H4080><s%> "Go <S%H1980><s%> back <S%H7725><s%> to Egypt, <S%H4714><s%> for all <S%H3605><s%> the men <S%H376><s%> who were seeking <S%H1245><s%> your life <S%H5315><s%> are dead. <S%H4191><s%>"

So Moses <S%H4872><s%> took <S%H3947><s%> his wife <S%H802><s%> and his sons <S%H1121><s%> and mounted <S%H7392><s%> them on a donkey, <S%H2543><s%> and he returned <S%H7725><s%> to the land <S%H776><s%> of Egypt. <S%H4714><s%> Moses <S%H4872><s%> also took <S%H3947><s%> the staff <S%H4294><s%> of God <S%H430><s%> in his hand. <S%H3027><s%>

And the Lord <S%H3068><s%> said <S%H559><s%> to Moses, <S%H4872><s%> "When you go <S%H1980><s%> back <S%H7725><s%> to Egypt <S%H4714><s%> see <S%H7200><s%> that you perform <S%H6213><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> Pharaoh <S%H6547><s%> all <S%H3605><s%> the wonders <S%H4159><s%> which <S%H834><s%> I have put <S%H7760><s%> in your power; <S%H3027><s%> but I will harden <S%H2388><s%> his heart <S%H3820><s%> so that he will not let <S%H7971><s%> the people <S%H5971><s%> go. <S%H7971><s%>
"Then you shall say <S%H559><s%> to Pharaoh, <S%H6547><s%> 'Thus <S%H3541><s%> says <S%H559><s%> the Lord, <S%H3068><s%> "Israel <S%H3478><s%> is My son, <S%H1121><s%> My first-born.

"So I said <S%H559><s%> to you, 'Let <S%H7971><s%> My son <S%H1121><s%> go, <S%H7971><s%> that he may serve <S%H5647><s%> Me'; but you have refused <S%H3985><s%> to let <S%H7971><s%> him go. <S%H7971><s%> Behold, <S%H2009><s%> I will kill <S%H2026><s%> your son, <S%H1121><s%> your first-born."' "

Now it came <S%H1961><s%> about at the lodging <S%H4411><s%> place <S%H4411><s%> on the way <S%H1870><s%> that the Lord <S%H3068><s%> met <S%H6298><s%> him and sought <S%H1245><s%> to put <S%H4191><s%> him to death. <S%H4191><s%>

Then Zipporah <S%H6855><s%> took <S%H3947><s%> a flint <S%H6864><s%> and cut <S%H3772><s%> off <S%H3772><s%> her son's foreskin <S%H6190><s%> and threw <S%H5060><s%> [it] at Moses' feet, <S%H7272><s%> and she said, <S%H559><s%> "You are indeed <S%H3588><s%> a bridegroom <S%H2860><s%> of blood <S%H1818><s%> to me."

So He let <S%H7503><s%> him alone. <S%H7503><s%> At that time <S%H227><s%> she said, <S%H559><s%> "[You are] a bridegroom <S%H2860><s%> of blood <S%H1818><s%>" – because of the circumcision. <S%H4139><s%>

Now the Lord <S%H3068><s%> said <S%H559><s%> to Aaron, <S%H175><s%> "Go <S%H1980><s%> to meet <S%H7122><s%> Moses <S%H4872><s%> in the wilderness. <S%H4057><s%>" So he went <S%H1980><s%> and met <S%H6298><s%> him at the mountain <S%H2022><s%> of God, <S%H430><s%> and he kissed <S%H5401><s%> him.

And Moses <S%H4872><s%> told <S%H5046><s%> Aaron <S%H175><s%> all <S%H3605><s%> the words <S%H1697><s%> of the Lord <S%H3068><s%> with which <S%H834><s%> He had sent <S%H7971><s%> him, and all <S%H3605><s%> the signs <S%H226><s%> that He had commanded <S%H6680><s%> him [to do.]
Then Moses <S%H4872><s%> and Aaron <S%H175><s%> went <S%H1980><s%> and assembled <S%H622><s%> all <S%H3605><s%> the elders <S%H2205><s%> of the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Israel; <S%H3478><s%>

and Aaron <S%H175><s%> spoke <S%H1696><s%> all <S%H3605><s%> the words <S%H1697><s%> which <S%H834><s%> the Lord <S%H3068><s%> had spoken <S%H1696><s%> to Moses. <S%H4872><s%> He then performed <S%H6213><s%> the signs <S%H226><s%> in the sight <S%H5869><s%> of the people. <S%H5971><s%>

So the people <S%H5971><s%> believed; <S%H539><s%> and when they heard <S%H8085><s%> that the Lord <S%H3068><s%> was concerned <S%H6485><s%> about the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%> and that He had seen <S%H7200><s%> their affliction, <S%H6040><s%> then they bowed <S%H6915><s%> low <S%H6915><s%> and worshiped. <S%H7812><s%>
